document_data.name: Therlon
document_data.deathnotes: [[Mirtul 5]], likely casualty during attempted raid on [[Elminster]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Therlon''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Per [[Storm Silverhand]]'s inside information on the War Wizards, he was a good sort and not quick to resort to dangerous spells.
document_data.Abilities: Therlon was good on his local knowledge of the [[Hullack Forest]] and the zone around [[Tethgard]]. He personally knew some tracking and identifying spells, though they were not powerful enough to work in [[Tethgard]] after the [[Spellplague]].
document_data.History: Therlon carried out reconnaissance for a band of War Wizards sent to kill or capture [[Elminster Aumar]] and [[the Simbul]] in the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, after the first stole the ''[[Royal Gorget of Battle]]'' and the latter destroyed a village in a bout of madness.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|36-37|3}} Therlon was not amongst the named survivors later.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|43|3}}
